name: Zac's RPG Test
description:
Buncha bullshit I made while messing with RPG Maker MV. You start out in an overworld you can run around in and gawk at stuff. You can also find a town, and inside that is a secret lair... (There's only one thing to mess with in there, but still)

Move with the arrow keys and interact objects and NPCs with Z or SPACE. You won't get text for interacting with everything, but a lot of things :B

Edit: New update, cutscene and stuff (it's late 9w9)
